channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: Sotomayor admits some Supreme court decisions have driven her to tears. I hope she does more than that. How about agreeing to testify openly in the Senate about what exactly drove her to tears.
item.source:markdown: Sotomayor admits some Supreme court decisions have driven her to tears. I hope she does more than that. How about agreeing to testify openly in the Senate about what exactly drove her to tears.

item.description: I think the “fediverse” is questionable. At some point it has to deliver a benefit to justify the extra overhead. The web is simple and works.
item.source:markdown: I think the “fediverse” is questionable. At some point it has to deliver a benefit to justify the extra overhead. The web is simple and works.

item.description: 2016: The point of the First Amendment is that it protects the most offensive speech. If there weren't any offensive speech we wouldn't need protection. And some thin-skinned billionaires find anything but fawning praise to be offensive.
item.source:markdown: 2016: The point of the First Amendment is that it protects the most offensive speech. If there weren't any offensive speech we wouldn't need protection. And some thin-skinned billionaires find anything but fawning praise to be offensive.

item.description: The disturbing truth is that there’s probably more sincerity than not in American politics. We may not want to believe it, but most of the people in charge say what they mean and mean what they say.
